cast.name: 保罗·斯珀里尔 Paul Spurrier
皮萨迈·帕克迪维吉特 Pisamai Pakdeevijit

writer.name: 保罗·斯珀里尔 Paul Spurrier

director.name: 保罗·斯珀里尔 Paul Spurrier

introduction: Whilst growing up in rural Thailand, a young orphan girl is taught the ways of magic by her grandmother. But when grandmother falls sick, Dau is lured to Bangkok to find work so that she can buy medicine. She finds herself working in a go-go bar, and her journey from naiveté to maturity is swift. She uses the magical skills her grandmother taught her to her advantage, but in doing so makes enemies within the bar. As her magic gets darker, and the consequences increasingly horrific, she gradually loses control, and something evil takes over. Written by Paul Spurrier
